his life. Few of Michael Vick 's supporters have been as staunchly behind him as Andy Reid .`` He had a plan and he stuck to that, both on and off the field,'' Andy Reid said. He knew certain things he wanted to get better at and he was open to the coaching on it, and he got himself back into shape.... You can never erase that, but you can sure help change others from falling into that same problem. A star in Atlanta for most of his six seasons as a Falcon after being selected first overall in the 2001 draft, Michael Vick missed 2007 and 2008 while incarcerated for 18 months in a federal prison.
